description: This schema represents time-location data (GPS traces). It has a series of GPS points in a list of the form [{point1}, ..., {pointn}]  where each {point} list is {timestamp, latitude, longitude, altitude} for now

___lat.description: The latitude where this data point was created.

___lng.description: The longitude where this data point was created.

___timeStamp.description: The timestamp when this data point was created.
